name: MKCircleRenderer
desc: The visual representation of a circular overlay.

items.name: init(circle: MKCircle)
items.desc: Creates a new overlay view using the specified circle overlay object.

items.name: var circle: MKCircle
items.desc: The circle overlay object that contains the information used to draw the overlay.

items.name: var strokeStart: CGFloat
items.desc: The unit distance along the circle where the stroke starts.

items.name: var strokeEnd: CGFloat
items.desc: The unit distance along the circle where the stroke ends.
